Findings - effect of reduced pH: Low pH did not affect fertilization rate as a sole stressor.
Author: Guo et al.
Interaction:
Abalone: the toxicity of Cu on fertilization was aggravated by low pH (synergistic), but toxicity of Zn was alleviated (antagonistic), and no interaction effect on egg diameter. 

Oyster: the toxicity of Cu and Zn on fertilization was alleviated by low pH (antagonistic).
